channel.title: Need help with models!
channel.description:
Hey mopar, i posted a few posts but this is the first on this subject, sorry I didn't know where to post it because I don't know if it's server-sided or client-sided. So anyway, I have been trying to add slayer helm to my server for along time... I am using butterscape 317 (I think it's delta!). I added ints and models, from this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465700.msg3405358.html#msg3405358 When I added the models, this is what I get......... Wielded.. [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2vv3xus.png[/img] Inventory Model... [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/148zvvl.png[/img] These are the ints
if(i == 15195) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13412; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 810; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 28; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 208; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 5; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 13414;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13413;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = 6573;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Slayer Helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "What an amazing design.".getBytes();//examin info }
Please help I really want slayer helm on my server!!! if you need any more info just post

item.title: Need help with models!
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

Hey mopar, i posted a few posts but this is the first on this subject, sorry I didn’t know where to post it because I don’t know if it’s server-sided or client-sided.

So anyway, I have been trying to add slayer helm to my server for along time… I am using butterscape 317 (I think it’s delta!).

I added ints and models, from this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465700.msg3405358.html#msg3405358

When I added the models, this is what I get…
Wielded…

Inventory Model…

These are the ints

if(i == 15195) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13412; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 810; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 28; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 208; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 5; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 13414;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13413;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = 6573;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Slayer Helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "What an amazing design.".getBytes();//examin info }

Please help I really want slayer helm on my server!!! if you need any more info just post
